trans-unit.source: Defines those health-monitoring events raised at a periodic interval.
trans-unit.target: 定义以定期间隔引发这些运行状况监视事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management>命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。</xref:System.Web.Management>

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。

trans-unit.source: The heartbeat health-monitoring events serve as a timer for the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.
trans-unit.target: 检测信号运行状况监视事件用作 ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统计时器。

trans-unit.source: They are raised at an interval defined by the `heartBeatInterval` attribute of the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 它们在定义的间隔引发`heartBeatInterval`属性`healthMonitoring`配置节。

trans-unit.source: The WebHeartbeatEvent uses the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics> class to obtain process information.
trans-unit.target: WebHeartbeatEvent 使用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics>类来获取进程信息。</xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。

trans-unit.source: You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Management.WebHeartbeatEvent"></xref> class with the given message and event code.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Management.WebHeartbeatEvent"></xref>类替换为给定的消息和事件代码。

trans-unit.source: The code associated with the event.
When you implement a custom event, the event code must be greater than <xref href="System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当实现自定义事件时，事件代码必须要大于<xref href="System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Provides key information about the running process.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关正在运行的进程的密钥信息。
